name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump arrived in England today and he was greeted by hundreds of angry protesters. Of course, it didn’t help that Trump arrived in England wearing a Croatian soccer jersey. While in the U.K., President Trump was asked if he was worried about the protests there. And he said, “I think they agree with me on immigration.” Trump has a point. Many people in England want him immediately deported. A Republican congressional candidate sent out anti-Semitic messages in a robocall. Of course, anti-Semites are now furious that robots are taking their jobs. The founder of Papa John's has resigned after using a racial slur in a conference call. People are calling it the second worst thing Papa John's founder ever said since “I'm starting a pizza company.”
